name: Very intrigued by Ulysses with its latest update, which includes a native “split view” on iPad. That said, I am currently pretty happy with Drafts. Are there other major benefits for Ulysses over Drafts?

content.html: Very intrigued by Ulysses with its latest update, which includes a native “split view” on iPad. That said, I am currently pretty happy with Drafts. Are there other major benefits for Ulysses over Drafts?

summary: @cleverdevil I think for some, the organization and smart filter support is big for some. Personally, I find it a bit too easy to lose things I’ve written in Drafts, but I love the action support for when I do want to be done with something.
